item.title: 人工智能会扼杀初级工作吗？ 我们了解到的情况
item.description:
招聘职位大幅减少，年轻人失业率上升，但新的研究表明，人工智能可能会扩大某些领域的就业机会，这是一个新出现的悖论。【原文：

Job postings have plunged and unemployment is up for young people, yet new research suggests an emerging paradox in which AI may expand access in some fields.

】

item.title: 铜市动荡不安，等待特朗普 50%关税的详细内容
item.description:
许多贸易商希望征税能够涵盖所有精炼形式和主要下游产品，并具有普遍性。【原文：

Many traders expect the levy to cover all refined forms and key downstream products, and to be universal.

】

item.title: Prosus 开始出售所持中国美团 40 亿美元的股份
item.description: 熟知内情的人士称，在中国食品配送应用美团宣布计划开始在巴西等一些 Prosus 旗下地区扩张后，Prosus NV 已开始出售其持有的美团股份，美团的估值超过 40 亿美元。【原文：Prosus NV has started selling down its stake in Meituan, a holding valued at more than $4 billion, after the Chinese food-delivery app announced plans to start expanding in some of Prosus’ territories such as Brazil, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 赞比亚在选举前寻求将国际货币基金组织协议延长 12 个月
item.description: 赞比亚内阁已为这个南部非洲国家申请将其国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）计划延长12个月扫清了道路，此举将使债权人感到满意，因为这将有助于该国在明年8月大选前继续严格控制支出。【原文：Zambia’s cabinet has cleared the way for the southern African nation to request a 12-month extension of its International Monetary Fund program, a move that will please creditors as it will help the country maintain tighter controls on spending ahead of elections in August next year.】

item.title: 沃顿商学院研究发现："笨 "人工智能机器人合谋操纵市场
item.description: 这是监管者的噩梦：对冲基金在股票和债券交易所释放人工智能机器人；但它们不仅是竞争，还是勾结。它们不为收益而战，而是操纵价格、囤积利润，并将人类交易员排除在外。【原文：It’s a regulator’s nightmare: Hedge funds unleash AI bots on stock and bond exchanges — but they don’t just compete, they collude. Instead of battling for returns, they fix prices, hoard profits, and sideline human traders.】

item.title: 扭亏希望使法国兴业银行在第二季度报告发布前升至 2011 年高点
item.description: 法国兴业银行（Societe Generale SA）的股价创下了 2011 年以来的日内最高水平，这一天正值该法国银行集团公布第二季度业绩的前一天，因为人们对首席执行官斯拉沃米尔-克鲁帕（Slawomir Krupa）的扭亏计划抱有更大的希望。【原文：Societe Generale SA shares hit their highest intra-day levels since 2011, a day ahead of the publication of the French banking group’s second-quarter results as hopes about Chief Executive Officer Slawomir Krupa’s turnaround plan gained further traction.】

item.title: Palantir 股票结构赋予创始人坚持到底的力量
item.description: 欢迎收看《深度科技》（Tech In Depth），这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日通讯。今天，莉泽特-查普曼（Lizette Chapman）将报道 Palantir 的所有权结构，这种结构使创始人拥有实际控制权。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Lizette Chapman reports on Palantir’s ownership structure, which gives effective control to the founders.】

item.title: 特朗普征收关税的最后期限临近，贸易协议细节稀缺
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统声称，他的贸易协议 "进展顺利"，将重振美国制造业并创造就业机会。【原文：President Donald Trump claims that his trade deals are “working out very well,” will revive American manufacturing and create jobs.】

item.title: 美联储可能出现 1993 年以来首次双理事异议
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂，波士顿的经济编辑。今天我们关注美联储即将做出的政策决定。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston. Today we’re looking at the Federal Reserve’s upcoming policy decision. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: TikTok 添加更多安全工具，扩展事实核查功能
item.description: TikTok 正在推出几项新的安全功能，包括其社区笔记式产品的扩展版本，因为整个社交网络行业在保护心理健康方面做得不够好而受到抨击。【原文：TikTok is rolling out several new safety features, including a more expansive version of its community notes-style product, as the broader social networking industry is under fire for not doing enough to protect mental health.】

item.title: KKR 为私人资产抵押融资交易融资 65 亿美元
item.description: KKR & Co. 集资约 65 亿美元，投资于资产担保融资，这是该公司迄今为止规模最大的一次信贷融资。【原文：KKR & Co. gathered about $6.5 billion of capital to invest in asset-backed finance, marking the firm’s largest credit fundraise to date.】

item.title: Thoma Bravo 达成收购 Trading Technologies 股份的交易
item.description: 据知情人士透露，收购公司 Thoma Bravo 已同意收购 Trading Technologies International Inc.【原文：Buyout firm Thoma Bravo has agreed to acquire a stake in Trading Technologies International Inc. in a transaction valued at more than $1 billion, according to people with the matter.】

item.title: 加密货币公司在新时代采用华尔街的金融策略
item.description: Crypto Inc. 直接借鉴了华尔街的游戏规则。【原文：Crypto Inc. is borrowing straight from Wall Street’s playbook.】

item.title: 华尔街对新兴市场的巨额贷款引发风险担忧
item.description: 从巴拿马到安哥拉，发展中国家都在直接向华尔街银行借款，获取短期流动性，以帮助应对不断上升的债务负担，但却面临长期隐患的风险。【原文：Developing nations from Panama to Angola are borrowing directly from Wall Street banks, getting short-term liquidity to help cope with rising debt burdens at the risk of longer-term pitfalls.】

item.title: Figma 首席执行官菲尔德的薪酬包括 20 亿美元的 "登月计划"。
item.description: Figma Inc. 公司的迪伦-菲尔德（Dylan Field）已通过本周计划的首次公开募股巩固了其十亿美元的财富。不过，由于获得了类似埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的分批补偿方案，他可能会再获得一笔 10 位数的薪酬。【原文：Figma Inc.’s Dylan Field has already cemented a billion-dollar fortune with this week’s planned initial public offering. But he could be looking at another 10-figure payday, thanks to a tranched compensation package similar to Elon Musk’s.】

item.title: 香港放宽资本规则吸引内地购房者
item.description: 香港正在想方设法放宽内地专业人士购房的资金转移规定，以重振其低迷的房地产市场。【原文：Hong Kong is seeking ways to ease capital transfer rules for mainland professionals buying property, in a bid to revive its flagging real estate market.】

item.title: 审计发现，印度航空公司在当地航空公司中问题最多
item.description: 根据一项年度安全审计，印度航空集团是印度航空公司中问题最多的。【原文：The Air India Group had the most issues among Indian carriers, according to an annual safety audit that began much before the carrier lost an aircraft in a crash last month.】

item.title: 受边境冲突和空难影响，IndiGo 盈利下滑 20
item.description: 印度最大的航空公司 IndiGo 公布的季度利润降幅超过预期，原因是边境冲突导致部分机场短暂关闭，以及印度航空公司一架飞机坠毁，打击了旅行需求。【原文：IndiGo, India’s largest airline, reported a larger-than-expected drop in quarterly profit after a brief shutdown of some airports due to a border conflict and an Air India plane crash hit travel demand.】

item.title: 意大利联合圣保罗银行净利息收入超出预期
item.description: Intesa Sanpaolo SpA 的第二季度业绩超出预期，因为贷款收入高于预期。【原文：Intesa Sanpaolo SpA’s second quarter-results beat estimates as lending income was higher than expected.】

item.title: 修正数据显示德国终究经历了漫长的经济衰退
item.description: 根据修订后的统计数据，德国经济在 2022 年底陷入衰退，并在随后的两年中没有增长。【原文：Germany’s economy succumbed to a recession in late 2022 and didn’t grow for the two years that followed, according to revised statistics.】

item.title: 微软和 Meta 因人工智能支出狂潮面临投资者质疑
item.description: 随着人工智能军备竞赛丝毫没有放缓的迹象，一些大型科技公司的财报季已演变成资本支出季。【原文：Earnings season for a handful of megacap tech firms has morphed into capex season with the AI arms race showing no signs of slowing.】

item.title: VF 公司扭亏为盈，业绩大幅增长
item.description: VF 公司公布的第一财季盈利超出华尔街预期，表明扭亏为盈的努力正在显现成效，VF 公司股价随之飙升。【原文：VF Corp. shares soared after the the apparel and shoe company reported fiscal first-quarter earnings that beat Wall Street expectations, signaling that turnaround efforts are showing results.】

item.title: 关税开始实施，嘉里集团将成本转嫁给客户
item.description: 食品生产商嘉里集团（Kerry Group Plc）开始转嫁更高的成本，因为关税提高了其向顶级品牌供应产品时所用原料的价格。【原文：Food producer Kerry Group Plc is starting to pass on higher costs as tariffs raise the price of ingredients it uses in its supply of products to top brands.】

item.title: Humana 因医疗保险优势业务增长而上调指导价
item.description: Humana Inc.周三上调了今年的利润指导，一反美国医疗保险行业的趋势，因为最近几个月大多数其他公司都下调了预测。【原文：Humana Inc. raised its profit guidance for the year on Wednesday, bucking a trend in the US health insurance industry after most other companies cut their forecasts in recent months.】

item.title: Glencore 合资公司收购巨型石油储存基地，未来将有盈余
item.description: 当市场正在为预期的供过于求做准备时，一家 Glencore Plc 合资企业正在收购非洲最大的石油储存基地。【原文：A Glencore Plc joint venture is buying into Africa’s biggest oil storage site at a time when the market is bracing for an expected oversupply.】

item.title: 邦吉公司第二季度利润降至2018年以来最低点
item.description: 由于关税和美国生物燃料政策的不确定性持续存在，给农作物贸易商和加工商造成压力，邦吉全球公司（Bunge Global SA）第二季度利润降至七年来最低。【原文：Bunge Global SA’s second-quarter profits fell to the lowest in seven years as lingering uncertainty over tariffs and US biofuel policy continued to pressure crop traders and processors.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦在通胀忧虑中保持基准利率稳定
item.description: 巴基斯坦央行连续第二次会议维持基准利率稳定，在通胀风险上升和关税不确定性挥之不去的情况下选择了谨慎行事。【原文：Pakistan’s central bank held its benchmark interest rate steady for a second consecutive meeting, choosing caution amid rising inflation risks and lingering tariff uncertainty.】

item.title: 股票投资者现在最喜欢鸽派的美联储
item.description:
货币政策可能是股市所剩无几的风险之一

Monetary policy might be among the few risks left for the stock market

】

item.title: 韩国总统李明博为与美国达成协议而做出让步，可能招致农民的愤怒
item.description: 在首尔南部一个闷热的牛棚里，苍蝇在数百头奶牛身上飞来飞去，这里是美国和韩国贸易谈判的中心地带。【原文：In a sweltering cattle shed south of Seoul, flies dart across hundreds of cows sitting at the heart of a trade talks between the US and South Korea.】

item.title: 唐纳德-特朗普的 50%关税威胁让巴西央行头疼不已
item.description: 预计唐纳德-特朗普最快将于本周对巴西征收 50%的关税，这将对巴西央行长期保持高利率的策略提出考验。【原文：Brazil central bank’s strategy to keep interest rates high for a prolonged period will be put to the test by the 50% tariffs Donald Trump is expected to slap on the country as soon as this week.】
